DEAL MEMO - Project Phoenix

Target Company: TechStart Inc
Valuation: $15M
Deal Type: Series A
Lead Investor: Acme Ventures

Key Metrics:
ARR: $2.1M
MRR Growth: 15% MoM
Customers: 47 enterprise
Churn: 3.2% monthly

Due Diligence Items:
- Financial audit (Q1-Q4 2025)
- IP review and patent search
- Customer reference calls (5 minimum)
- Technical architecture review
- Team background checks
